title: Maharani Emerald Diamond Haaram - The Timeless Classic
materials: natural Zambian Emeralds (Pachalu) and brilliant-cut Diamonds. Features a meticulous Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This Haaram showcases a regal floral motif design, intricately set with round Emeralds and shimmering Diamonds. The central pendant features a larger Emerald in a geometric setting, complemented by delicate diamond-studded peacock motifs, symbolizing grace and prosperity. The gold lacework embodies the classic South Indian style.
colors: A harmonious blend of vibrant green Emeralds and sparkling white Diamonds
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivahalu)
and festive occasions like Deepavali and Sankranthi. A treasured heirloom for generations.
description: This Maharani Haaram is a statement of timeless elegance and unparalleled craftsmanship. The combination of high-quality Emeralds and Diamonds, set in rich gold with the impeccable Hyderabadi polish, ensures lasting beauty and value. It’s not just jewelry; it’s an investment in tradition and artistry.
